text: Peter Sydney Ernest Lawford (born Peter Sydney Ernest Aylen; September 7, 1923 â€“ December 24, 1984) was an English-born American actor and singer. He was born in London. He was a member of the "Rat Pack" along with Dean Martin. He was married to Patricia Kennedy. Lawford then became the brother-in-law to President John F. Kennedy. He had four children; including Christopher. From the 1940s to the 1960s, he had a strong role in popular culture and starred in a number of popular movies. Lawford died from cardiac arrest caused by renal failure and liver failure in Los Angeles, California, aged 61. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1923 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Deaths from liver failure Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from London Category:Singers from London
title: Peter Lawford
